title: COMPANY DETAILS
description: In this section, we will ask you for legal details of your company.

formData.name: companyName
formData.label: Company name
formData.small: This is the "legal name" of your company (not the trade name) or your name if you are self-employed, in our case it would be: ZIP ONLINE SERVICES SL.

formData.name: tradeName
formData.label: Trade name
formData.small: This is the "commercial name" of your company, in our case it would be: ZIPTRANSFERS.

formData.name: vat
formData.label: VAT / IVA / NIF
formData.small: This is the legal identification number of your company (value-added tax). It is known in different ways depending on the country: VAT, IVA, or NIF/CIF.

address.name: zipCode
address.label: Zip code
address.small: Also known as Postal Code in some countries.

address.name: country
address.label: Country
address.small: This is the country where your company is registered.

address.name: province
address.label: Province - State
address.small: This is the province or state where your company is registered.
